titles.title: SF537 Lord Jesus, once a child,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord Jesus, once a child,
Saviour of young and old,
receive this little child of ours - or "these little ones"
into your flock and fold.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You drank the cup of life,
its bitterness and bliss,
and loved us to the uttermost
for such a child as this. - or "children such as these."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So help us, Lord, to trust,
through this baptismal rite,
not in our own imperfect love,
but in your saving might.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord Jesus, for his sake, - or "her, their"
lend us your constant aid,
that he,when older, may rejoice - or "she, they"
we kept the vows we made.
